peets coffee.name: Anniversary 2020
peets coffee.short_description: A celebration of 100% women-grown coffee, perfectly balanced between bright and sweet.
peets coffee.flavor_note: Fine chocolate and cherry notes melt to a velvety finish

peets coffee.name: Major Dickason's Blend®
peets coffee.short_description: Conceived by one of the first Peetniks and refined by Mr. Peet, this premier blend is our all-time bestseller.
peets coffee.flavor_note: Rich, smooth, and complex, with a very full body and multi-layered character.

peets coffee.name: House Blend
peets coffee.short_description: A perennial customer favorite, this inviting Latin American blend is a perfect introduction to Peet’s coffees.
peets coffee.flavor_note: Lively, sweet, and familiar Latin Blend

peets coffee.name: French Roast
peets coffee.short_description: To brew French Roast is a commitment to a rich, powerful taste, pronounced smoky overtones, and pleasant bite.
peets coffee.flavor_note: Coffee-forward, smoky, bittersweet, hints of caramel.

peets coffee.name: Arabian Mocha-Java
peets coffee.short_description: The world’s most famous blend, created with Java and Arabian mocha beans long before coffee was widely grown.
peets coffee.flavor_note: Full-bodied, with bittersweet chocolate overtones enhancing a rich complexity.

peets coffee.name: Guatemala San Sebastián
peets coffee.short_description: The best farm in Antigua and a favorite of our Roastmasters for more than 40 years.
peets coffee.flavor_note: Cacao-rich, elegant acidity, the very best of Antigua.

peets coffee.name: Yosemite Dos Sierras Organic
peets coffee.short_description: Complex and satisfying, with milk chocolate sweetness. Now available year-round.
peets coffee.flavor_note: Complex and satisfying with milk chocolate sweetness.

peets coffee.name: Organic French Roast
peets coffee.short_description: To brew French Roast is a commitment to a rich, powerful taste, pronounced smoky overtones, and pleasant bite.
peets coffee.flavor_note: Coffee-forward, smoky, bittersweet, hints of caramel.

peets coffee.name: Uzuri African Blend®
peets coffee.short_description: A beautiful, fully sustainable coffee that helps small-scale farmers improve their lives.
peets coffee.flavor_note: Orange blossom, black cherry, silky-smooth body.

peets coffee.name: Gaia Organic Blend®
peets coffee.short_description: A bounteous world blend of certified organic coffees from Africa, Indonesia, and the Americas.
peets coffee.flavor_note: Floral to full-bodied, three-region organic extravagance.

peets coffee.name: Aged Sumatra
peets coffee.short_description: Known for complex flavors originally developed on Dutch spice trade voyages, now imparted by our aging method.
peets coffee.flavor_note: Rich and ample-bodied. Dried fruit sweetness, tropical wood and herbal notes.

peets coffee.name: Arabian Mocha Sanani
peets coffee.short_description: Harsh, dry mountain terrain and primitive farming give this full-bodied desert miracle a distinctive wildness.
peets coffee.flavor_note: Lush and full bodied with hints of cocoa and dates, and a complex, pungent aroma.

peets coffee.name: Baridi Blend
peets coffee.short_description: Artfully crafted for cold brew, this blend of bold, juicy East African coffees is refreshingly crisp.
peets coffee.flavor_note: Inherently sweet and aromatic with a clean finish.

peets coffee.name: Big Bang
peets coffee.short_description: A brilliant blend to celebrate our 50th anniversary, featuring the exotic fruitiness of Ethiopian Super Natural.
peets coffee.flavor_note: Vibrant blast of tropical fruit in a smooth, medium style

peets coffee.name: Brazil Minas Naturais
peets coffee.short_description: Naturally processed coffee cherries from the Minas Gerais region, sweetened by the Brazilian sun.
peets coffee.flavor_note: Smooth, full bodied and sun-dried sweet with natural notes of hazelnut.

peets coffee.name: Café Domingo®
peets coffee.short_description: This medium-roast blend was crafted from three Latin American coffees for slow sipping and savoring.
peets coffee.flavor_note: Smooth and balanced, with hints of toffee sweetness and a crisp, clean finish.

peets coffee.name: Colombia
peets coffee.short_description: Only the most exceptional growths of Colombia, often from the high southern redoubt of San Agustin, Huila.
peets coffee.flavor_note: Balanced brightness and sweetness. Full-bodied, with shades of the coffee fruit.

peets coffee.name: Colombia Luminosa
peets coffee.short_description: Our lightest and brightest roast with exceptional flavor that is distinctly Peet's.
peets coffee.flavor_note: Pleasant mild, smooth flavor with delicately sweet aromas

peets coffee.name: Costa Rica
peets coffee.short_description: Our single-origin Costa Rica is a true regional coffee that reflects the country’s vibrant, venerable culture.
peets coffee.flavor_note: A satisfying, full-bodied cup with deep, pungent flavor and a hint of smokiness just below the surface.

peets coffee.name: Costa Rica Aurora
peets coffee.short_description: The dawn of something great. Costa Rica meets Kenya for a brand new day in coffee.
peets coffee.flavor_note: Layers of dark, silken berry meet bright, clean citrus sweetness.

peets coffee.name: Espresso Forte®
peets coffee.short_description: Crafted specifically for espresso, this superbly balanced blend has stout body, rich flavor and perfect crema.
peets coffee.flavor_note: Robust, with rounded body, thick, creamy consistency and a tangy core of flavor.

peets coffee.name: Ethiopian Fancy
peets coffee.short_description: An elegant experience from Ethiopia, the birthplace of coffee, meticulously prepared by the washed method.
peets coffee.flavor_note: Medium-bodied and pungent, with tangy citrus flavors and lingering floral aroma.

peets coffee.name: Garuda Blend®
peets coffee.short_description: A blend of the finest single-origin Indo-Pacific coffees that celebrates the diverse flavors of the islands.
peets coffee.flavor_note: Full-bodied, broad, and aromatic. Richly textured with earthy, nutty, character.

peets coffee.name: Italian Roast
peets coffee.short_description: A penetrating roast just shy of French with flavorful, full-bodied coffees from Latin America and the Pacific.
peets coffee.flavor_note: Vigorous and intense, with immense depth and texture. Rewardingly flavorful.

peets coffee.name: Kenya Auction Lot
peets coffee.short_description: The most prized auction and private sale microlots, never blended but artisan roasted one after the other.
peets coffee.flavor_note: Big and juicy. Browned sugar sweetness with sublime berry and citrus overtones.

peets coffee.name: New Guinea Highlands
peets coffee.short_description: The volcanic soil of Papua New Guinea turns Jamaican Blue Mountain beans into one of the world’s best coffees.
peets coffee.flavor_note: Rich and mellow, yet aromatically complex. Full-bodied with broad flavors.

peets coffee.name: Sulawesi-Kalosi
peets coffee.short_description: Traditional cultivation methods and semi-aging make this rare coffee taste like it was grown in heaven.
peets coffee.flavor_note: Full bodied and uniquely complex. Intoxicating herbal, nutty, earthy flavors.

peets coffee.name: Sumatra
peets coffee.short_description: Cultivated in small gardens and rustically hand processed, this Indo-Pacific coffee is a classic favorite.
peets coffee.flavor_note: Rustic and earthy, with a hefty body, complex sweetness and herbal nuances.

peets coffee.name: Decaf Mocca-Java
peets coffee.short_description: Water-process decaffeination makes this rich, ancient blend of Java and Ethiopian Mocca a discerning decaf.
peets coffee.flavor_note: Complex and chocolaty flavors, with a well-rounded body and touch of sweetness.

peets coffee.name: Decaf Major Dickason's Blend®
peets coffee.short_description: Our most popular blend, without caffeine. Quite possibly the most flavorful cup of decaf you’ll ever have.
peets coffee.flavor_note: All the rich complexity and body of the original. A surprisingly bold decaf.

peets coffee.name: Decaf House Blend
peets coffee.short_description: The signature Peet’s roast gives our Decaf House more body and complexity than almost any other decaf blend.
peets coffee.flavor_note: Medium

peets coffee.name: Decaf French Roast
peets coffee.short_description: This blend of decaffeinated Latin American coffees has all the rich, dark flavor of our regular French Roast.
peets coffee.flavor_note: Powerful, smoky flavors and complexity without all the caffeine.

peets coffee.name: Decaf Sumatra
peets coffee.short_description: With the same richness and character as our regular Sumatra, it’s hard to imagine this is a decaf coffee.
peets coffee.flavor_note: Very full-bodied, with rustic complexity and earthy, nutty, subtly herbal flavors.

peets coffee.name: Sumatra Solok Radjo
peets coffee.short_description: A deeply satisfying Sumatra with surprising acidity and a refreshing mission: re-forestation
peets coffee.flavor_note: Herbal and pepper aromatics; spicy and complex with surprising acidity

peets coffee.name: Red Mocha Haraaz
peets coffee.short_description: A coffee of ancient origin and a bit of a miracle—one of the richest and most exquisite cups of the year.
peets coffee.flavor_note: Delicate aromas of cherry blossom, deep wine and fruit notes, and a dry cocoa finish.

peets coffee.name: JR Reserve Blend®
peets coffee.short_description: Our most exquisite coffee blend, created by Roastmaster Emeritus Jim Reynolds from rare lots.
peets coffee.flavor_note: Exceptionally complex and full-bodied, revealing hints of chocolate and spice.

peets coffee.name: Kona
peets coffee.short_description: Our single-estate, 100% Kona combines the top two grades—Fancy and Extra Fancy—for extra dimension.
peets coffee.flavor_note: Hibiscus aroma with passion fruit sweetness. Delicate, apricot finish.
